org.cleverbus.common
Class Tools

java.lang.Object
  org.cleverbus.common.Tools

public final class Tools
extends Object

Class with common methods for use. For usage look into test ToolsTest class.

joinNonEmpty

public static String joinNonEmpty(String[] array,
                                  char separator)
Joins the provided input Strings into one String, separated by the provided separator character. Null and empty elements are skipped.

Parameters:
array - an array of String to join together into one String
separator - separator character to separate the array elements with
Returns:
the string merged from array, separated by the specified character
